V.label: Web Program
V.tip: Specifies ASPX module that handles the task in Taskmaster Web

V.label: Create Document Node
V.tip: Specifies to create doc node for the scan task

V.label: Create Batch Directory
V.tip: Specifies to assume batch creation mode and create batch directory

V.label: Output DCO File
V.tip: Specifies name for the output dco file for the task

V.label: Allow Hold
V.tip: Allows placing batches on hold to continue later

V.label: Validation Statuses
V.tip: Comma-separated list of Done,Override,Fail statuses assigned after validation, according to results.

P.tip: Settings that enable RRS rules execution
P.title: Rulerunner Service

V.label: Show Start Batch Panel
V.tip: Enables start batch panel with data validations

V.label: Main Task Profile(s)
V.tip: Main task profile to run on Submit

V.label: Alternative Task Profile(s)
V.tip: Alternative task profile setting creates extra buttons for special data handling cases

V.label: Preparation Task Profile
V.tip: Task profile to prepare date before display

P.tip: RRS log settings for the task
P.title: RRS Log Settings

V.label: Service Log
V.tip: Enable RRS service logging

V.label: Batch Log
V.tip: Produce RRS log in batch folder

V.label: Action Log Level
V.tip: Severity level for RRS logging from action execution

V.label: Flush Buffer
V.tip: Flushes file buffer after each write operation - degrades performance

V.label: RRS Type
V.tip: Switch between LocalRRS and HttpWRRS execution

V.label: WRRS URL
V.tip: Specify HTTP URL path for WRRS execution

V.label: Enable Custom Panels
V.tip: Setting to use pre-made custom data entry panels

G.title: Bind Panel to DCO Type
G.tip: Key-Value pairs to associate DCO Type to Panel class

V.tip: Association of DCO Type to Panel class name

V.label: Local Scan Directory
V.tip: Temporary scan directory to place images into + \batchid\

V.label: Local Processing
V.tip: Enables uploadless process, to place IMAGEFILEs into ScanDir=RootBatchDir

V.label: Upload Immediately
V.tip: Combines Scan+Upload tasks in one, - when enabled initiates upload when Done is pressed

V.label: Enable Page ID
V.tip: Allows to ID images based on Setup DCO types

V.label: Upload Pause
V.tip: Delay between uploading images or groups of images for UI refresh purpose

V.label: Max Upload Size
V.tip: Combine images into groups of max size for upload speed-up

V.label: File Extension
V.tip: Specify file extension - which files to filter and grab from source folder during vscan process

V.label: File Compression
V.tip: Specify file compression (Snowbound Lib. constant) how to write image file after rotate/change operation on the image

V.label: Enable Hold Button
V.tip: When unchecked - disallow batches to be put on Hold during scanning
